sentences.english: The distance of the braiding product is not adjustable. If necessary, the gear to be replaced shall be adjusted.
sentences.chinese: 編帶產品間距不可調，如果需要調整要更換齒輪。

sentences.english: All right, any questions about that. Yeah?
sentences.chinese: 遞歸調用來解決其他問題？

sentences.english: A soft, deep taupe shade that has subtle hues of rose.
sentences.chinese: 柔和，深黑色帶有微妙的玫瑰色調。

sentences.english: The melt of slim yellow and pink is deducing the subject of love forever.
sentences.chinese: 昏黃與粉色調的交織，輕輕演繹永久不變的愛的主題。

sentences.english: Are plans to pump water from the Bohai Sea to China's arid far west necessary to ensure energy supply?
sentences.chinese: 中國渤海水西調工程對確保能源供應是必須的嗎？

sentences.english: Add all ingredients into an ice filled shaker.
sentences.chinese: 加入所有材料到加冰的調酒壺。

sentences.english: It takes the microwave time to warm up your dinner enough to unfreeze it.
sentences.chinese: 微波爐需要花一點時間才能將溫度調到足夠解凍它。

sentences.english: A master bedroom is a masterpiece in white with a floating furniture arrangement.
sentences.chinese: 白色調的主臥是一個大空間僅用傢俱區分不同的區域。

sentences.english: I watch TV with subtitles and the volume cranked up.
sentences.chinese: 我看的是帶字幕的電視節目，音量調得很大。

sentences.english: Close the lid and turn the knob to pork cooking cycle to stew about 15 minutes.
sentences.chinese: 蓋上蓋子，調至肉類檔位燜煮大約15分鐘。

sentences.english: When I get cold, I turn up the Sun.
sentences.chinese: 當我覺得冷了，我就把太陽的溫度調高。

sentences.english: Section V, inheriting, development and prospect of Inner Mongolia-Han melody.
sentences.chinese: 蒙漢調的傳承發展與展望。

sentences.english: He walked into the principal’s office and asked to be moved into another class.
sentences.chinese: 他直接走進校長辦公室，要求調到別的班。

sentences.english: Set the camera for a long-distance shot.
sentences.chinese: 調好相機，拍一張遠距離的照片。

sentences.english: I changed the white balance setting, color temp. changed.
sentences.chinese: 白平衡調了一下，色溫變了。

sentences.english: The second chapter describes the phonology transfer system of Yunxian dialect.
sentences.chinese: 第二章描寫鄖縣方言的聲韻調系統。
